_header: Sith that eye that works my wellfare
_description: A song on Absence — thirteen 9-line stanzas

CamMagPep1408.First Lines:
Sen that EIne that workis my weilfairdois no moir on me
                    glance…
CamMagPep1408.Last Lines:
…but plaint þat smartisSilence to dolour is ane
                    nowrisching
